sources.title: Trailer Life (1937)
sources.description: Farmer Al Falfa's House Caravan is filled with marvelous, futuristic push button devices. One morning a crazy Indian gets in and locks Al out, but all the gadgets go haywire and run him off. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/trailer-life-1937/

metadata.Plot: Farmer Al Falfa's House Caravan is filled with marvelous, futuristic push button devices. One morning a crazy Indian gets in and locks Al out, but all the gadgets go haywire and run him off.
metadata.Writer: Joseph Barbera, Dan Gordon, Paul Terry
